name: Tim 7: Et La Correspondante
storyline: To re-motivate Tim 7 who is wasting away, Gaaf authorizes him to correspond with a young stranger, but on the sole condition that his letters are perfectly written, without a spelling or conjugation error. Tim 7 will do everything to make her interested in his fate...
summary:
Tim 7: Et La Correspondante is an edutainment game focusing on 5e level of French.

The contents of the subject are:
The pitfalls of verb/subject agreement: identify the subject: proper noun, infinitive, pronoun, simple or extended noun group; know what the indefinite pronoun represents; master the subject relative pronoun; impersonal forms, “this+being”, collective subject: identify the real subject.

Study of the word: etymology; radical, prefix, suffix; homonyms and paronyms; compound nouns.

Conjugations: verbs of the third group: present indicative and simple past; compound tenses: past anterior and future anterior; present subjunctive, present imperative and present conditional.

Qualifying adjective and past participle: agreement of the qualifying adjective; masculine plural and feminine of qualifying adjectives; agreement of the past participle with the auxiliaries être and avoir.

You play as Tim 7, named as such due to being kidnapped by Dr. Gaaf and being the 7th guinea pig of his experiments. Tim 7 has lost his memories and you need to help him escape the island.
